title: Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark III 20.1MP Digital Point & Shoot Camera - Black
description: Tested, it works. It does have some scrapes and paint wear, which can be seen in the pictures. This doesn't affect the camera performance. The screen also has some scratches, which I provided a close-up picture of. The lens has some dust inside but no scratches. This doesn't affect the image quality. *No battery charger or cable* Includes - Battery (Original) - 256GB Memory Card

reviews.author: David Martinez
reviews.title: Solid camera for the price
reviews.content: I've been using this for about a month now and it's been great. The image quality is really good, especially for a used camera. I do wish it came with a charger but that's my fault for not reading the description more carefully. Overall happy with the purchase.

reviews.author: Jennifer Kim
reviews.title: Good camera, small cosmetic issues
reviews.content: Exactly as described. There are some scratches but nothing major. The camera works perfectly fine and takes great photos. I use it for family events and it's been reliable. The 256GB card is definitely a bonus, gives me plenty of space.

reviews.author: Robert Thompson
reviews.title: Perfect for YouTube videos
reviews.content: I needed a camera for my cooking channel and this one works great. The flip screen is super handy when I'm filming myself. The picture quality is sharp and the zoom works well. Only complaint is the battery life but I bought a spare so no big deal.
